title: Ariosto's satyres in seuen famous discourses, shewing the state, 1 Of the Court, and courtiers. 2 Of libertie, and the clergie in generall. 3 Of the Romane clergie. 4 Of marriage. 5 Of soldiers, musitians, and louers. 6 Of schoolmasters and scholers. 7 Of honor, and the happiest life. In English, by Garuis Markham.
author: Ariosto, Lodovico, 1474-1533.
publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Roger Iackson, dwelling in Fleet-street, neere the great Conduit,
notes: In fact translated by Robert Tofte.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
